verses.verse: וַ֠יִּסְעוּ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū left ( Water from the Rock) ( 40 20:1-13) כָּל־ 3605 N-msc ( kāl-) Then the whole עֲדַ֨ת 5712 N-fsc ( ‘ă·ḏaṯ) congregation בְּנֵֽי־ 1121 N-mpc ( bə·nê-) ... יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל 3478 N-proper-ms ( yiś·rā·’êl) of Israel מִמִּדְבַּר־ 4057 Prep-m│N-msc ( mim·miḏ·bar-) the Desert סִ֛ין 5512 N-proper-fs ( sîn) of Sin, לְמַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם 4550 Prep-l│N-mpc│3mp ( lə·mas·‘ê·hem) moving from place to place עַל־ 5921 Prep ( ‘al-) as פִּ֣י 6310 N-msc ( pî) commanded. יְהוָ֑ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ 2583 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3mp ( way·ya·ḥă·nū) They camped בִּרְפִידִ֔ים 7508 Prep-b│N-proper-fs ( bir·p̄î·ḏîm) at Rephidim, וְאֵ֥ין 369 Conj-w│Adv ( wə·’ên) but there was no מַ֖יִם 4325 N-mp ( ma·yim) water לִשְׁתֹּ֥ת 8354 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( liš·tōṯ) to drink. הָעָֽם׃ 5971 Art│N-ms ( hā·‘ām) for the people

וַיָּ֤רֶב <WH7378> way·yā·reḇ contended הָעָם֙ <WH5971> hā·‘ām So the people עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- with מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> way·yō·mə·rū , תְּנוּ־ <WH5414> tə·nū- “ Give לָ֥נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) us מַ֖יִם 4325 N-mp ( ma·yim) water וְנִשְׁתֶּ֑ה 8354 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjImperf-1cp ( wə·niš·teh) to drink. ” וַיֹּ֤אמֶר 559 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yō·mer) replied. לָהֶם֙ Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) מֹשֶׁ֔ה 4872 N-proper-ms ( mō·šeh) Moses מַה־ 4100 Interrog ( mah-) “ Why תְּרִיבוּן֙ 7378 V-Qal-Imperf-2mp│Pn ( tə·rî·ḇūn) do you contend עִמָּדִ֔י 5978 Prep│1cs ( ‘im·mā·ḏî) with me? ” מַה־ 4100 Interrog ( mah-) “ Why תְּנַסּ֖וּן 5254 V-Piel-Imperf-2mp│Pn ( tə·nas·sūn) do you test אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - יְהוָֽה׃ 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD? ”

וַיִּצְמָ֨א <WH6770> way·yiṣ·mā thirsted שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> šām there, הָעָם֙ <WH5971> hā·‘ām But the people לַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> lam·ma·yim for water וַיָּ֥לֶן <WH3885> way·yā·len and they grumbled הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> hā·‘ām ... עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- against מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer ...: לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> lām·māh “ Why זֶּה֙ <WH2088> zeh - הֶעֱלִיתָ֣נוּ <WH5927> he·‘ĕ·lî·ṯā·nū have you brought us מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mim·miṣ·ra·yim out of Egypt — לְהָמִ֥ית <WH4191> lə·hā·mîṯ to make אֹתִ֛י <WH853> ’ō·ṯî us וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- and בָּנַ֥י <WH1121> bā·nay our children וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - מִקְנַ֖י <WH4735> miq·nay and livestock בַּצָּמָֽא׃ <WH6772> baṣ·ṣā·mā die  of thirst? ”

וַיִּצְעַ֤ק <WH6817> way·yiṣ·‘aq cried out מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mō·šeh Then Moses אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> lê·mōr ... מָ֥ה <WH4100> māh “ What אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> ’e·‘ĕ·śeh should I do לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> lā·‘ām people? הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz·zeh with these ע֥וֹד <WH5750> ‘ō·wḏ A little more מְעַ֖ט <WH4592> mə·‘aṭ ... וּסְקָלֻֽנִי׃ <WH5619> ū·sə·qā·lu·nî and they will stone me! ”

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah·weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses, עֲבֹר֙ <WH5674> ‘ă·ḇōr “ Walk on לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lip̄·nê ahead of הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> hā·‘ām the people וְקַ֥ח <WH3947> wə·qaḥ and take אִתְּךָ֖ <WH854> ’it·tə·ḵā with you. מִזִּקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> miz·ziq·nê some of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel וּמַטְּךָ֗ <WH4294> ū·maṭ·ṭə·ḵā the staff אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ’ă·šer with which הִכִּ֤יתָ <WH5221> hik·kî·ṯā you struck בּוֹ֙ Prep│3ms ( bōw) אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - הַיְאֹ֔ר 2975 Art│N-proper-fs ( hay·’ōr) the Nile, קַ֥ח 3947 V-Qal-Imp-ms ( qaḥ) Take along בְּיָדְךָ֖ 3027 Prep-b│N-fsc│2ms ( bə·yā·ḏə·ḵā) in your hand וְהָלָֽכְתָּ׃ 1980 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-2ms ( wə·hā·lā·ḵə·tā) and go.

הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> hin·nî Behold, עֹמֵד֩ <WH5975> ‘ō·mêḏ I will stand לְפָנֶ֨יךָ <WH6440> lə·p̄ā·ne·ḵā before שָּׁ֥ם׀ <WH8033> šām there עַֽל־ <WH5921> ‘al- you הַצּוּר֮ <WH6697> haṣ·ṣūr by the rock בְּחֹרֵב֒ <WH2722> bə·ḥō·rêḇ at Horeb. ( Horeb is another name for Sinai.) וְהִכִּ֣יתָ <WH5221> wə·hik·kî·ṯā And when you strike בַצּ֗וּר <WH6697> ḇaṣ·ṣūr the rock, וְיָצְא֥וּ <WH3318> wə·yā·ṣə·’ū will come out מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <WH4480> mim·men·nū of it מַ֖יִם <WH4325> ma·yim water וְשָׁתָ֣ה <WH8354> wə·šā·ṯāh to drink. ” הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> hā·‘ām for the people וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> way·ya·‘aś did כֵּן֙ <WH3651> kên this מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mō·šeh So Moses לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> lə·‘ê·nê in the sight זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> ziq·nê of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel.

וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> way·yiq·rā He named שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> šêm ... הַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> ham·mā·qō·wm the place מַסָּ֖ה <WH4532> mas·sāh Massah ( Massah means testing.) וּמְרִיבָ֑ה <WH4809> ū·mə·rî·ḇāh and Meribah ( Meribah means quarreling.) עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- because רִ֣יב׀ <WH7379> rîḇ quarreled, בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> bə·nê the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... וְעַ֨ל <WH5921> wə·‘al and because נַסֹּתָ֤ם <WH5254> nas·sō·ṯām they tested אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> lê·mōr saying, הֲיֵ֧שׁ <WH3426> hă·yêš “ Is יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD בְּקִרְבֵּ֖נוּ <WH7130> bə·qir·bê·nū among us אִם־ <WH518> ’im- or אָֽיִן׃פ <WH369> ’ā·yin not? ”

וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> way·yā·ḇō came ( The Defeat of the Amalekites) עֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> ‘ă·mā·lêq After this, the Amalekites וַיִּלָּ֥חֶם <WH3898> way·yil·lā·ḥem and attacked עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- ... יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl the Israelites בִּרְפִידִֽם׃ <WH7508> bir·p̄î·ḏim at Rephidim.

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> mō·šeh So Moses אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ Joshua, בְּחַר־ <WH977> bə·ḥar- “ Choose לָ֣נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) vvv אֲנָשִׁ֔ים 582 N-mp ( ’ă·nā·šîm) some of our men וְצֵ֖א 3318 Conj-w│V-Qal-Imp-ms ( wə·ṣê) and go out הִלָּחֵ֣ם 3898 V-Nifal-Imp-ms ( hil·lā·ḥêm) to fight בַּעֲמָלֵ֑ק 6002 Prep-b│N-proper-ms ( ba·‘ă·mā·lêq) the Amalekites. מָחָ֗ר 4279 Adv ( mā·ḥār) Tomorrow אָנֹכִ֤י 595 Pro-1cs ( ’ā·nō·ḵî) I נִצָּב֙ 5324 V-Nifal-Prtcpl-ms ( niṣ·ṣāḇ) will stand עַל־ 5921 Prep ( ‘al-) on רֹ֣אשׁ 7218 N-msc ( rōš) the hilltop הַגִּבְעָ֔ה 1389 Art│N-fs ( hag·giḇ·‘āh) ... וּמַטֵּ֥ה 4294 Conj-w│N-msc ( ū·maṭ·ṭêh) with the staff הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים 430 Art│N-mp ( hā·’ĕ·lō·hîm) of God בְּיָדִֽי׃ 3027 Prep-b│N-fsc│1cs ( bə·yā·ḏî) in my hand. ”

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> way·ya·‘aś did יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ Joshua כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ka·’ă·šer as אָֽמַר־ <WH559> ’ā·mar- had instructed לוֹ֙ Prep│3ms ( lōw) him מֹשֶׁ֔ה 4872 N-proper-ms ( mō·šeh) Moses לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם 3898 Prep-l│V-Nifal-Inf ( lə·hil·lā·ḥêm) and fought בַּעֲמָלֵ֑ק 6002 Prep-b│N-proper-ms ( ba·‘ă·mā·lêq) against the Amalekites, וּמֹשֶׁה֙ 4872 Conj-w│N-proper-ms ( ū·mō·šeh) while Moses, אַהֲרֹ֣ן 175 N-proper-ms ( ’a·hă·rōn) Aaron, וְח֔וּר 2354 Conj-w│N-proper-ms ( wə·ḥūr) and Hur עָל֖וּ 5927 V-Qal-Perf-3cp ( ‘ā·lū) went up רֹ֥אשׁ 7218 N-msc ( rōš) to the top הַגִּבְעָֽה׃ 1389 Art│N-fs ( hag·giḇ·‘āh) of the hill.

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> wə·hā·yāh - כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ka·’ă·šer As long as יָרִ֥ים <WH7311> yā·rîm held up מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> yā·ḏōw his hands, וְגָבַ֣ר <WH1396> wə·ḡā·ḇar prevailed; יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl Israel וְכַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> wə·ḵa·’ă·šer but when יָנִ֛יחַ <WH5117> yā·nî·aḥ he lowered יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> yā·ḏōw [them], וְגָבַ֥ר <WH1396> wə·ḡā·ḇar prevailed. עֲמָלֵֽק׃ <WH6002> ‘ă·mā·lêq Amalek

וִידֵ֤י <WH3027> wî·ḏê hands מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mō·šeh When Moses’ כְּבֵדִ֔ים <WH3515> kə·ḇê·ḏîm grew heavy, וַיִּקְחוּ־ <WH3947> way·yiq·ḥū- they took אֶ֛בֶן <WH68> ’e·ḇen a stone וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> way·yā·śî·mū and put תַחְתָּ֖יו <WH8478> ṯaḥ·tāw it under him, וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> way·yê·šeḇ and he sat עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> ‘ā·le·hā on it. וְאַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> wə·’a·hă·rōn Then Aaron וְח֜וּר <WH2354> wə·ḥūr and Hur תָּֽמְכ֣וּ <WH8551> tā·mə·ḵū held בְיָדָ֗יו <WH3027> ḇə·yā·ḏāw his hands up, מִזֶּ֤ה <WH2088> miz·zeh one אֶחָד֙ <WH259> ’e·ḥāḏ on each וּמִזֶּ֣ה <WH2088> ū·miz·zeh ... אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> ’e·ḥāḏ side, וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> way·hî remained יָדָ֛יו <WH3027> yā·ḏāw so that his hands אֱמוּנָ֖ה <WH530> ’ĕ·mū·nāh steady עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- until בֹּ֥א <WH935> bō went down. הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> haš·šā·meš the sun

וַיַּחֲלֹ֧שׁ <WH2522> way·ya·ḥă·lōš overwhelmed יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ So Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עֲמָלֵ֥ק <WH6002> ‘ă·mā·lêq Amalek וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> ‘am·mōw and his army לְפִי־ <WH6310> lə·p̄î- ... חָֽרֶב׃פ <WH2719> ḥā·reḇ with the sword.

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah·weh Then the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses, כְּתֹ֨ב <WH3789> kə·ṯōḇ “ Write this זֹ֤את <WH2063> zōṯ ... זִכָּרוֹן֙ <WH2146> zik·kā·rō·wn as a reminder בַּסֵּ֔פֶר <WH5612> bas·sê·p̄er on a scroll וְשִׂ֖ים <WH7760> wə·śîm and recite בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> bə·’ā·zə·nê ... יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ it to Joshua, כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- because מָחֹ֤ה <WH4229> mā·ḥōh I will utterly blot out אֶמְחֶה֙ <WH4229> ’em·ḥeh ... אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - זֵ֣כֶר <WH2143> zê·ḵer the memory עֲמָלֵ֔ק <WH6002> ‘ă·mā·lêq of Amalek מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> mit·ta·ḥaṯ from under הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> haš·šā·mā·yim heaven. ”

וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> way·yi·ḇen built מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mō·šeh And Moses מִזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> miz·bê·aḥ an altar וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> way·yiq·rā and named שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> šə·mōw it יְהוָ֥ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD נִסִּֽי׃ <WH5251> nis·sî Is My Banner. ( Hebrew YHWH Nissi)

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer he said, כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- “ Indeed, ” יָד֙ <WH3027> yāḏ “ a hand עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- was lifted up toward כֵּ֣ס <WH3676> kês the throne יָ֔הּ <WH3050> yāh of the LORD. מִלְחָמָ֥ה <WH4421> mil·ḥā·māh will war לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD בַּֽעֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> ba·‘ă·mā·lêq against Amalek מִדֹּ֖ר <WH1755> mid·dōr from generation דֹּֽר׃פ <WH1755> dōr to generation. ”
